hanzi-su-wiki:
駄

Значения

Вьюк; плохой, низкого качества

Мнемоника

Вьючная лошадь 馬 с толстыми 太 тюками на спине. Хозяин едет на другой, лучшей лошади.

Варианты

驮, 馱
purpleculture_pinyin:
tuó
Japanese variant of 驮
Японский вариант 驮
rtega_mnemonic:
馱馱RS
驮驮		駄horse load, pack-horse
  • horse 馬 carrying a big 大/太 load
heisig_constituent: burdensome, team of horses, plump, large, St. Bernard, drop
Keyword_KANJIDIC: burdensome, pack horse, horse load, send by horse
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: обременительным, пакет лошадь, лошадь груз, отправить на лошади
koohiiStory1: If a passenger is too plump and heavy, its too burdensome for the horse.
koohiiStory2: If your horses get so plump to be good for nothing they just become burdensome.
jp_example_words:
駄作(ださく): poor work, rubbish
無駄遣い(むだづかい): waste money on, squander money on, flog a dead horse
下駄(げた): wooden clogs
駄目(だめ): no, no good, hopeless
無駄(むだ): futility, uselessness
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A horse that is fat is a burdensome animal.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: A fat horse. So burdensome. Not to mention the burden on the horse on top of the fatness.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: But you have to be nice to the burdensome horse because this horse is your dad (だ).
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Go visit your dad the burdensome horse because you have to visit your dad. It's weird because you're a human and he's a horse.
Ru_Meaning: burdensome, pack horse, horse load, send by horse

Radicals: 馬, 太  (horse, fat)
Meaning Mnemonic
A horse that is fat is a burdensome animal.
A fat horse. So burdensome. Not to mention the burden on the horse on top of the fatness.
Reading Mnemonic
But you have to be nice to the burdensome horse because this horse is your dad (だ).
Go visit your dad the burdensome horse because you have to visit your dad. It's weird because you're a human and he's a horse.
